Skills.Description: At start of Wave, raises own Stun RES by 100.00% for 15s. Also raises ATK by <color=red>{2}%</color> multiplied by number of Red Elementals in party for 60s. Further increases ATK by <color=red>{5}%</color> multiplied by number of Humans in party for 60s.
